official_title: Mindful After Cancer Study: Fostering Positive Body Image, Sexual Health, and Well-being
inclusion_criteria:
* Diagnosis of breast or gynecologic cancer at least one year prior to enrollment
* English speaking
* Have access to a computer, smart phone, or tablet with internet access
* Ability to spend 15-30 minutes per day on program activities
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must be FEMALE
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 89 Years
